FuncDef: The display e-trunk packet-statistics command displays E-Trunk packet statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an E-Trunk ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 128.

Examples: Received packets with state reason errors   : 0
Received packets with TLV check errors      : 0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After an E-Trunk is configured, you can run the display e-trunk packet-statistics command to check E-Trunk packet statistics. The command output helps you determine whether the statistics are normal and locate faults if the statistics are abnormal.
